description:
Short-time worker

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
13211 Labour market statistics of the Federal Employment
Agency

Definition:
Short-time workers are employed people whose working hours
in an establishment are reduced by more than 10 percent
because of a temporary shortage of work and who are entitled
to short-time working benefit.
